title: Wallos LXC
textContent:
Wallos LXC 
                Wallos is an
                    Open-Source Personal Subscription Tracker
                To create a new Proxmox VE Wallos LXC, run the following in the Proxmox VE Shell. 
                    To Update Wallos, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/wallos.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 1GB RAM - 5GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡
                Wallos Interface - IP
outerHTML:
Wallos LXC

Wallos is an Open-Source Personal Subscription Tracker

To create a new Proxmox VE Wallos LXC, run the following in the Proxmox VE Shell.
To Update Wallos, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/wallos.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 1GB RAM - 5GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡

Wallos Interface - IP
